metadata.sousChapitre: Image et noyau, théorème du rang

value.latex: Soient $f,g \in \mathcal{L}(E)$ tels que $f\circ g \circ f = f$ et $g \circ f\circ g = g$.
value.html: Soient \(f,g \in \mathcal{L}(E)\) tels que \(f\circ g \circ f = f\) et \(g \circ f\circ g = g\).

value.latex: $\vec u = (\vec u - g\circ f(\vec u)) + g\circ f(\vec u)$.
value.html: \(\vec u = (\vec u - g\circ f(\vec u)) + g\circ f(\vec u)\).

value.latex:
$f(\Im g) \subset \Im f$.\par
             $f = (f\circ g) \circ f  \Rightarrow  \Im f \subset \Im(f\circ g)= f(\Im g)$.
value.html:
\(f(\Im g) \subset \Im f\).

\(f = (f\circ g) \circ f \Rightarrow \Im f \subset \Im(f\circ g)= f(\Im g)\).
